description: Angular component for handling recipe search functionality, including search input, filters (difficulty, preparation time), and toggle/clear filter controls.

classes.name: RecipeSearchComponent
classes.description: Angular component that manages the user interface for searching recipes with filters, debounce, and state management.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and sets up the debounced search observable.

methods.name: ngOnDestroy
methods.description: Cleans up subscriptions when component is destroyed.

methods.name: onSearchInput
methods.description: Handles search input updates with debounce to optimize search requests.

methods.name: onDifficultyChange
methods.description: Handles changes to the difficulty filter.

methods.name: onPrepTimeChange
methods.description: Handles changes to the preparation time filter.

methods.name: toggleFilters
methods.description: Toggles visibility of advanced filter options.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Resets all filters and search query to default values.

methods.name: updateFilters
methods.description: Constructs the current search filter object and updates the service with new filters.
